duties_responsibilities.duty: Model and promote company values and philosophy, using the 6 Pillars of success as the foundation.
Maintain patient chart and documentation in accordance with regulatory rules and regulations.
Enter and maintain patient information including referral intake data, newly admitted patient information, colleague time and visit count, etc.
Coordinate communication with the members of the Interdisciplinary Team (IDT) and maintain positive working relationships within the Company.
Answer incoming calls, transfer calls appropriately, and provide accurate messages.
Assist with pre- and post-IDT activities, including agendas, updated plans of care, etc.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required. Two to three years related experience and/or training highly preferred.
